channel.title: pages on Fredrik K. Gustafsson | PhD Student in Probabilistic Deep Learning
channel.description: Recent content in pages on Fredrik K. Gustafsson | PhD Student in Probabilistic Deep Learning

item.title: News
item.description: [Apr 18, 2023] Accepted paper: Refusion: Enabling Large-Size Realistic Image Restoration with Latent-Space Diffusion Models has been accepted to CVPR Workshops 2023. [Mar 16, 2023] Today I presented Some Advice for New (and Old?) PhD Students [slides] at our weekly division meeting. [Feb 8, 2023] New preprint: How Reliable is Your Regression Model’s Uncertainty Under Real-World Distribution Shifts? [arXiv] [code] [project]. [Jan 27, 2023] New preprint: Image Restoration with Mean-Reverting Stochastic Differential Equations [arXiv] [code] [project].
